subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Bill Elliott will stand by as a possible replacement for the driver Scott Riggs of Evernham Motorsports this weekend at Infineon Raceway in Statesville, N.C., after Riggs sustained cuts to both feet while unloading a jet ski in an oyster bed.
snippet: Bill Elliott will stand by as a possible replacement for the driver Scott Riggs of Evernham Motorsports this weekend at Infineon Raceway in Statesville, N.C., after Riggs sustained cuts to both feet while unloading a jet ski in an oyster bed.
